meanings.definition: The state or quality of being solitary or alone.
meanings.sent1: Her soleness in the forest brought her peace and quiet.
meanings.sent2: The soleness of the old man's cabin was comforting to him.
meanings.sent3: The soleness of the cat made it the perfect pet for the introverted girl.
meanings.sent4: The soleness of the desert at night was both eerie and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The soleness of the library allowed her to focus on her reading without distractions.

meanings.definition: The state of being the only one of its kind; uniqueness.
meanings.sent1: The soleness of the ancient artifact made it a valuable find.
meanings.sent2: The soleness of her talent set her apart from the other singers.
meanings.sent3: The soleness of the recipe made it a family secret for generations.
meanings.sent4: The soleness of the diamond sparkled like no other gem in the collection.
meanings.sent5: The soleness of his invention revolutionized the industry.
